openconsensus.metrics

Interface MetricRegistry


  • public interface MetricRegistry
    Creates and manages a set of metrics for a library/application.
    Since:
    0.1.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  MetricRegistry.Builder
      Builder class for the MetricRegistry.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DerivedDoubleCumulative.Builder derivedDoubleCumulativeBuilder(String name)
      Returns a builder for a DerivedDoubleCumulative to be added to the registry.

      Returns a builder for a DerivedDoubleGauge to be added to the registry.

    • Method Detail

      • longGaugeBuilder

        LongGauge.Builder longGaugeBuilder(String name)
        Returns a builder for a LongGauge to be added to the registry. This is more convenient form when you want to manually increase and decrease values as per your service requirements.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the metric.
        Returns:
        a LongGauge.Builder.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if name is null.
        IllegalArgumentException - if different metric with the same name already registered.
        Since:
        0.1.0

      • doubleGaugeBuilder

        DoubleGauge.Builder doubleGaugeBuilder(String name)
        Returns a builder for a DoubleGauge to be added to the registry. This is more convenient form when you want to manually increase and decrease values as per your service requirements.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the metric.
        Returns:
        a DoubleGauge.Builder.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if name is null.
        IllegalArgumentException - if different metric with the same name already registered.
        Since:
        0.1.0

      • derivedLongGaugeBuilder

        DerivedLongGauge.Builder derivedLongGaugeBuilder(String name)
        Returns a builder for a DerivedLongGauge to be added to the registry. This is more convenient form when you want to define a gauge by executing a ToLongFunction on an object.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the metric.
        Returns:
        a DerivedLongGauge.Builder.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if name is null.
        IllegalArgumentException - if different metric with the same name already registered.
        Since:
        0.1.0
